comments:
Description:
Exception occurs when preview a report inlcude more than three crosstabs in Web viewer[1102]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070521-0630

Steps to reproduce:
Scenario1:
1, open the attached report design
2, Preview in Web viewer

Scenario2:
1, Create four crosstabs in one report
2, Preview the report in Web viewer

Expected result:
In scenario1, the preview is successful and without exceptions
In scenario2, no empty crosstab in preview

Actual result:
In scenario1, Exception occurs
In scenario2, The last two crosstab are empty with no value

Error log:
ReportDesign (id = 1): 
- Retrieving binding data error 
Retrieving binding data error ( 4 time(s) )
